title: Amazon: Hidden Expedition v1.1.1 (Full)
description:
Big Fish Games takes you on an adventure into the stunning world of the Amazon with the Hidden Expedition team in search of a missing professor. A tattered map referencing the legendary Beetle Temple is your only clue as you begin your adventure deep into the Amazon Rainforest. 

Explore cities, temples, and ruins while unlocking the secrets of an ancient yet advanced civilization. This adventure is the largest yet for the Hidden Expedition team, and the discovery of the Beetle Temple is just the beginning.

Features:

- 50 hidden object scenes 
- 14 unique mini games 
- Replay chapters to gain higher rankings

What's in this version:

*Previously purchased unlocks are now unlocking the game properly.
*Game now installs correctly on devices after download.
*Fixes a crash that was occurring on any 4.2.2 Android phone.
*Fixes an issue with the Nexus 4 where the games resolution was cutting off Menu text.
*Now optimized for changes to the Google Play Store!
Thanks for your continued feedback and support! Rest assured that if one of our games is in need of an update, we'll get it to you just as soon as possible. Happy gaming!

More info:
 <a href="

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bigfishgames.google.heafree</a>


Instructions:

1.Copy 'com.bigfishgames.google.heafree' folder to 'sdcard/Android/Obb'
2.Install APK
3.Launch the game
